mapper.sql: id, token_id, participant_address, raffleAddress, ticket, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select count(*) from participant_info where raffleAddress = #{raffleaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

token_id = #{tokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
participant_address = #{participantAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update participant_info set token_id = #{tokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, participant_address = #{participantAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, raffleAddress = #{raffleaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ticket = #{ticket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
